FuncDef:
The web response-error-code disable command disables the host to send an authentication packet with error code 3 to the web server.
The undo web response-error-code disable command enables the host to send an authentication packet with error code 3 to the web server.
By default, the host sends an authentication packet with error code 3 to the web server.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
During web user authentication, when an authentication request is sent to the host, the host, by default, send an authentication packet with error code 3 to the web server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
